channel.title: Private servers lagging?
channel.description:
ok , whenever i got on a private server to play moparscape, i can barely move there, take like 5 secs to start moving after i actually click it. the right menu (inventory, quests) and stuff works perfectly, changes right after i press. has anyone had this problem?
i really need help how to stop that

item.title: Private servers lagging?
item.dc:creator: @Sane Sane
item.description:
@Sane wrote:

Its probaly because the server you are trieng to go on is having Lag Problems or your computer has a low RAM and can not handle it. Try switching servers

Read full topic
